channel.title: [508] need help making more player rights [508]
channel.description: i have the basic 0,1, and 2. but i want to make things like "test mod" or something.... how can i do this? (also if you didn't pay attention to the title, this is for a 508.)

item.source: [508] need help making more player rights [508]

item.title: [508] need help making more player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @Sparhawk Sparhawk
item.description:
@Sparhawk wrote:

I don’t know much about this to be honest, but couldn’t you do for your server for test staff like I did mine?

I simply made 5 characters all with the following permissions for testing

TestMod - Moderator
TestAdmin - Administrator
TestHidAdmin - Hidden Admin
TestCo - Co-owner
TestHidCo - Hidden Co-Owner

Read full topic
